name: @pojntfx/unisockets
description: A universal Berkeley sockets implementation for both WebAssembly (based on WebRTC) and native platforms with bindings for C, Go and TinyGo.

scripts.build: npm run build:bin && npm run build:lib && npm run build:docs && npm run build:diagram
scripts.build:docs: mkdir -p docs && typedoc --tsconfig -p tsconfig.json --mode file --dist docs --media docs/media .
scripts.dev:example-server: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --experimental-wasi-unstable-preview1 --experimental-wasm-bigint --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true out/c/echo_server.wasm
scripts.dev:example-client: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --experimental-wasi-unstable-preview1 --experimental-wasm-bigint --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true out/c/echo_client.wasm

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
